name: Lingo Bingo
techStack: React, Firebase, Tailwind CSS, React Router DOM, React CountUp, AOS, React Toastify
description: Lingo Bingo is a fun and interactive language learning application designed to help users expand their vocabulary and improve communication skills in a specific language. With features like vocabulary lessons, tutorials, and audio pronunciation, this app makes learning enjoyable and effective.
challenges: Faced challenges in implementing responsive design across multiple devices and integrating Google Sign-In with Firebase for user authentication.
improvements: Planning to enhance the performance by optimizing images, lazy loading, adding more language support, and incorporating interactive quizzes.

name: Visa Navigator Portal
techStack: React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Firebase, React Router DOM
description: Visa Navigator Portal simplifies the visa application process with a user-friendly platform. It helps users check visa requirements, apply online, and track their application status in real-time. With a secure and responsive design, the portal provides a seamless experience for travelers, students, and job seekers.
challenges: Struggled with integrating real-time application tracking and ensuring secure authentication through Firebase.
improvements: Planning to implement multilingual support, enhance data filtering options, and improve overall performance with optimization techniques.

name: Roomify Platform
techStack: React, Express JS, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, React Router, React Icons, React Modal, React Slick, React Leaflet
description: Roomify Platform is a hotel booking solution that offers users a seamless experience to explore, book, and manage hotel rooms with secure authentication. With a user-friendly interface, interactive features, and robust booking management, this platform ensures a smooth experience for travelers.
challenges: Faced challenges with integrating interactive maps and ensuring smooth real-time authentication via Firebase.
improvements: Planning to enhance room search functionality, improve performance, and add multi-language support.
